attributes.action: Allow Boris Johnson to build his bridge between the UK and France
attributes.background: For too long the limitations of train and ferry transport have prevented us from connecting with our French friends. By building this bridge we hope to, not only connect us physically to France but connect us nationally. This would help to improve our relations with Europe after Brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Allow Boris Johnson to build his bridge between the UK and France". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the UK Government to support and/or fund the building of a bridge between the UK and France.
